snippet: The Anschutz Entertainment Group, a major sports and concert company that operates more than 100 sites, has agreed to have StubHub operate its resale market. Also, a study finds that record labels have continued to invest in new talent.
abstract: The Anschutz Entertainment Group, a major sports and concert company that operates more than 100 sites, has agreed to have StubHub operate its resale market. Also, a study finds that record labels have continued to invest in new talent.

headline.main: Digital Notes: New Deal Gives StubHub a Greater Role in Concert Sales

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Federation of the Phonographic Industry
